title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - SEO Content (cats.center)
description:
Create SEO-optimized content for cats.center to drive organic search traffic.

## Target Keywords
1. "best cat breeds for apartments" - Article 1
2. "why is my cat not eating" - Article 2
3. "how to introduce cats to each other" - Article 3

## Content Requirements
- 1500+ words per article
- Keyword in title, H1, first paragraph
- 3-5 subheadings with related keywords
- Internal links to other cats.center pages
- Meta descriptions written
- Vet-reviewed or cited sources for health content

## Expected Results (3-6 months)
- Ranking on page 1 for target keywords
- 100-500 organic visitors per month per article
- Compounding traffic growth
acceptance_criteria: Article 1 published: best cat breeds for apartments
Article 2 published: why is my cat not eating
Article 3 published: how to introduce cats to each other
Meta descriptions set for all articles
testing_plan:
1. Google Search Console - verify indexing
2. Week 2: Check initial impressions
3. Month 1: Check ranking positions
4. Month 3: Review organic traffic attribution
rollback_plan: N/A - content can be updated if needed

comments.author: claude@afterdarksys.com
comments.text: Ticket created from Traffic Bootstrap planning session. SEO is long-term play - start immediately for compounding returns.
